locale.message: This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OJS. It requires the VG Wort publisher account and the configuration of the plugin settings.

This plugin enables integration and management of the VG Wort pixel tags in OJS. The system requirements are not fulfilled. Please ensure that PHP Soap, OpenSSL and CURL extension modules are available on the server.
Enter VG Wort publisher username and password that will be used for the VG Wort services authentication.

Specify a date in a year and/or the number of days after the article publication. The unregistered and active pixel tags will then be automatically registered with VG Wort on the specified date every year, or considering the specified amount of time after the article publication. If both options are set and the specified date in a year applies, all pixel tags will be considered regardless of the article publication date. If a pixel tag registration fails, a new attempt will be made to register the pixel tag next time the scheduled task runs.
Use the VG Wort test API (testing environment). Please do not forget to remove this option for the production.
Please enter a valid card number (2-7 numbers).
Choose the text type "Poem" if the submission text has less than 1800 characters.
